home.title: Reliable Car Shipping Across the Nation
home.description: At Dimi Noble, we stand out in the vehicle relocation sector. We believe in showcasing our excellence, not just making promises. Our services cover the entire country, providing our customers with the transportation of any type of vehicle.

whyUs.title: Why Dimi Noble?
whyUs.description: Many things make us stand out in our industry. These are the reasons why we are the go-to company for many in need of vehicle shipment.

benefits.title: Nationwide Coverage
benefits.description: Dimi Noble offers seamless vehicle relocation services across all 50 states, ensuring your vehicle reaches its destination efficiently, regardless of location.

benefits.title: Experienced Team
benefits.description: With over 5 years in the relocation industry, our specialists provide exceptional service to companies, agents, and individuals, ensuring a smooth and professional experience.

benefits.title: Fully Insured and Bonded Partners
benefits.description: We collaborate with fully insured and bonded partners, guaranteeing the safety and security of your vehicle throughout the transportation process.

benefits.title: Transparent Process
benefits.description: We pride ourselves on keeping clients informed, ensuring you understand every step of the transportation process for a hassle-free experience.

about.title: Dimi Noble Inc is a licensed shipping company that works with fully insured and bonded partners

description.intro: We are a nationwide vehicle relocation service, simplifying the process for businesses and individuals alike. Our commitment is to provide seamless and efficient transportation solutions.
description.experience: With over 5 years of expertise in the relocation industry, our specialists have served companies, contractors, and private individuals with excellence.
description.coverage: We operate across all 50 states, ensuring secure and reliable vehicle transportation through our fully insured and bonded partners.
description.trust: When you choose Dimi Noble, we prioritize transparency, keeping you informed at every step. Our goal is to provide top-tier service with unbeatable value.

items.question: What services does Dimi Noble Inc offer?
items.answer: Dimi Noble provides nationwide vehicle relocation services, handling all types of vehicles across all 50 states.

items.question: How can I request a quote for shipping my vehicle?
items.answer: You can request a quote by visiting our website and filling out the 'Get Your Price' form with your origin, destination, moving date, and phone number.

items.question: Is Dimi Noble Inc a licensed and insured company?
items.answer: Yes, Dimi Noble is a licensed shipping company that collaborates with fully insured and bonded partners.

items.question: How long has Dimi Noble been in the vehicle relocation industry?
items.answer: We have over 5 years of experience in the vehicle relocation industry, serving companies, contractual agents, and private individuals.

items.question: What types of vehicles can Dimi Noble Inc relocate?
items.answer: We handle the transportation of all types of vehicles, ensuring safe and reliable delivery across the nation.

items.question: How does the vehicle relocation process work?
items.answer: Our process involves the submission of a client request, providing an estimate, service selection and contract agreement, vehicle pickup, and delivery. For detailed information, please visit the 'How It Works' section on our website.

items.question: How can I contact Dimi Noble for more information?
items.answer: You can reach us via email at teamlead@diminoble.com or by phone at (561) 894-5331.

howItWorks.description: Follow our simple process to get your vehicle transported safely and efficiently

steps.title: Client Request Submission
steps.description:
The initial step we require from our clients is the submission of their request, which can be conveniently done through our integrated website, phone, or email. We seek the essential information to determine the best available option for you, following these steps:
- The first screen prompts you to input the year, make, and model of your vehicle. In case your vehicle is not listed, please contact us via email.
- Subsequently, you indicate whether the vehicle to be relocated is operational. It's crucial to note that the ability to start does not necessarily imply full functionality. A vehicle considered operational is one that starts, moves under its own power, and has functional brakes.
- On the next screen, we request information about the current location and destination of your vehicle, indicated by the zip codes of both locations.
- We also ask for your preferred timing for the project and your flexibility. You can choose immediate relocation or specify a particular date.
- In the following step, we need your contact details (name, email, and phone number) to save your quote under your name.

steps.title: Providing Estimates
steps.description:
The estimation process involves careful consideration of numerous factors, and although this may take some time, we aim to minimize the duration. In line with our commitment to delivering an affordable vehicle relocation service, our certified sales agents will internally process an application on your behalf. We meticulously assess all variables to furnish you with the most precise and economical pricing.
Distance stands out as a significant factor influencing the quoted price. However, the conventional notion that greater distance equates to higher transport costs isn't always accurate. If our drivers are already en route to or from your location, your transport expense may be only a fraction of the full price.
Several other factors contribute to the estimation, including the vehicle's length, condition, type, height, ground clearance, curb weight, and operational status. Each quote we present offers the choice between open transport or enclosed transport. Although the insurance coverage remains the same for both, some clients prefer closed transport, while others opt for open transport.

steps.title: Service Selection and Contract Agreement
steps.description:
Upon reviewing all the available options, we empower you to choose an offer. After your selection, we proceed to gather all the necessary information required for the transfer of your vehicle. The information crucial at this stage includes:
-The timing of our appointment.
-Your preferred location for the vehicle.-Confirmation of the vehicle's condition, and more.
-All this precise information is incorporated into the contract, which is then sent to you. We take extra care to document everything to prevent any misleading errors, miscommunication, or future misunderstandings. Our commitment is to ensure our customers feel secure in their dealings with us. We maintain transparency in business, assuring you that we don't make changes after an agreement, nor do we introduce hidden fees.

Our certified agents are always available to assist you. If you have any questions, or concerns, or need clarification, they are ready to help. For your convenience, you can choose to sign the contract either manually or electronically. Whatever suits you is suitable for us. Once the contract is signed, we promptly schedule a date for the project.

steps.title: Pick Up
steps.description:
On the agreed date and time, a vehicle will arrive at the specified location. Before commencing the loading procedure, the driver conducts a thorough inspection of the vehicle designated for transport. Every imperfection observed is documented, and you are promptly informed of any findings. Additionally, the floor of the hauler, responsible for transporting your vehicle, undergoes inspection to ensure there are no loose elements that could potentially harm your vehicle.
The safety of your vehicle, from the initiation of the transportation process to its delivery at the designated location, remains our top priority. Hence, we take measures to ensure the transportation of the vehicle in optimal condition.
Following the inspection, the driver carefully positions your vehicle in the dedicated space on the hauler, adhering to a specific order for loading and unloading. Stabilizer bars are then lowered to guarantee balanced weight for maximum reinforcement and security. Once your vehicle is securely on the hauler, the driver further ensures its stability by adding straps to both the front and rear of the vehicle. At each stop made during transport, the driver tests the load on the straps to maintain security.

steps.title: Delivery Process
steps.description:
On the day of your vehicle's delivery, it's important to note that our driver may have additional pickups and deliveries scheduled. The delivery route typically extends to the farthest location first, which means customers in closer proximity may receive their vehicles earlier. While your vehicle may be transported to various locations for pickups and deliveries along the way, it's unlikely to be moved again until it reaches your final destination.
For your convenience, the driver will coordinate with you to determine a suitable location for the drop-off. The driver will choose an open space that allows for turning around and facilitates the loading and unloading of other vehicles on board. During this phase, the strap securing your vehicle will be removed, the delivery report will be finalized, and the driver will perform the following actions:
-Inspect the vehicle and provide a detailed delivery report to the customer.
-Unload the vehicle and hand over the keys to the final destination.
-If the vehicle was initially picked up from a commercial facility and there is pertinent information to convey, our driver will share all relevant details about the vehicle.

We kindly request that you allocate approximately an hour of your time for the post-delivery process. This time is essential to ensure the careful and safe delivery of your vehicle

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subtitle: Introduction
privacyPolicy.description: Dimi Noble Inc ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website https://diminoble.com/, use our transportation services, or otherwise interact with us. Please read this policy carefully to understand our views and practices regarding your personal data.

1.title: 1. Information We Collect
1.content: We may collect and process the following types of information:
items: Personal Data: We collect personal information such as your origin, destination, moving date, and phone number. This information is used to provide our transportation services and to communicate with you.
Usage Data: Information about how you interact with our website, such as IP addresses, browser types, and pages viewed.
Cookies and Tracking Technologies: Information collected through cookies and other tracking technologies.

2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
2.content: We use the information we collect in the following ways:
items: To provide and maintain our transportation services
To manage and schedule your transportation services
To communicate with you, including responding to inquiries
To comply with legal obligations

3.title: 3. Sharing Your Information
3.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties. All information collected is used solely by Dimi Noble to fulfill our service commitments to you.

4.title: 4. Data Security
4.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data. However, please note that no transmission over the internet is entirely secure, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information.

5.title: 5. Your Rights
5.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, or object to the processing of your personal data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at leadmanager@expresscartransports.com or call +1 (561) 894-5331.

6.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
6.content: We may use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

7.title: 7. Compliance with Laws
7.content: We comply with applicable data protection laws and regulations, including the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA) and other relevant state and federal laws. We are committed to protecting your privacy and data rights.

8.title: 8. Changes to This Privacy Policy
8.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated revision date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we are protecting your information.

9.title: 9. Contact Us
9.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.subtitle: Introduction
termsAndConditions.description: These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of Dimi Noble's ("we," "us," or "our") vehicle shipping services. By accessing our website or utilizing our services, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms.

1.title: 1. Services Provided
1.content: Dimi Noble specializes in the nationwide transportation of various types of vehicles, working with fully insured and bonded partners to ensure safe and reliable delivery.

2.title: 2. User Responsibilities
2.content: Users must provide accurate and complete information when requesting our services. This includes, but is not limited to, the origin and destination addresses, moving dates, and contact information. Users are also responsible for preparing the vehicle for transport, which includes:
items: Ensuring the vehicle is clean for inspection purposes.
Disabling any alarms.
Maintaining a fuel level of 1/4 tank or less.
Removing or securing all loose parts, fragile or protruding accessories, and low-hanging spoilers.
Removing electronic toll collection devices to prevent unintended charges.

3.title: 3. Payment Terms
3.content: A down payment is required to initiate the shipping process. The remaining balance is due upon delivery of the vehicle and must be paid in full via cash, money order, or a certified check to the authorized carrier.

4.title: 4. Cancellation Policy
4.content: Orders may be canceled at any time before a carrier has been assigned without incurring any cancellation fees.

5.title: 5. Liability and Insurance
5.content: Dimi Noble and its partners are fully insured and bonded. However, users are advised to maintain their own insurance coverage. We are not liable for any personal items left in the vehicle during transport.

6.title: 6. Governing Law
6.content: These Terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the state in which Dimi Noble operates, without regard to its conflict of law principles.

7.title: 7. Contact Information
7.content: For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms, please contact us at:

accessibilityStatement.title: Accessibility Statement
accessibilityStatement.subtitle: Our Commitment
accessibilityStatement.description: Dimi Noble ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to ensuring accessibility for all users, including individuals with disabilities. We strive to make our website and services accessible and user-friendly for everyone.

1.title: 1. Accessibility Standards
1.content: We aim to comply with applicable accessibility standards, including the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 Level AA. Our efforts include improving website navigation, readability, and compatibility with assistive technologies.

2.title: 2. Features and Accommodations
2.content: To enhance accessibility, we have implemented the following features:
items: Keyboard navigation support for users who do not use a mouse.
Alternative text for images to assist screen reader users.
Sufficient color contrast to ensure readability.
Scalable text for users who need larger fonts.
Compatibility with screen readers and other assistive technologies.

3.title: 3. Ongoing Improvements
3.content: We continuously review and improve our website’s accessibility by conducting regular audits, incorporating user feedback, and following industry best practices.

4.title: 4. Third-Party Content
4.content: While we strive to ensure accessibility across our website, some third-party content or integrations may not fully comply with our accessibility standards. We encourage third-party providers to enhance their accessibility features.

5.title: 5. Feedback and Assistance
5.content: We welcome feedback on the accessibility of our website and services. If you experience any difficulties or need assistance, please contact us at:

organizationalPolicy.title: Organizational Policy
organizationalPolicy.subtitle: Introduction
organizationalPolicy.description: Dimi Noble ("we," "us," or "our") is committed to maintaining high standards of professionalism, integrity, and service excellence in the vehicle transportation industry. This Organizational Policy outlines our guiding principles, ethical standards, and operational commitments.

1.title: 1. Mission and Values
1.content: Our mission is to provide safe, reliable, and efficient vehicle transportation services while upholding values of transparency, customer satisfaction, and compliance with industry regulations.

2.title: 2. Code of Conduct
2.content: All employees, partners, and affiliates are expected to adhere to the highest ethical and professional standards. This includes:
items: Providing honest and transparent communication with customers and stakeholders.
Ensuring confidentiality and protecting sensitive customer information.
Avoiding conflicts of interest and acting in the best interests of clients and the company.
Maintaining a respectful and inclusive work environment.

3.title: 3. Compliance with Laws and Regulations
3.content: We operate in full compliance with all applicable local, state, and federal regulations regarding vehicle transportation. This includes adherence to licensing, insurance, and safety requirements.

4.title: 4. Customer Service Commitment
4.content: We are dedicated to providing exceptional customer service by:
items: Offering clear and accurate information regarding services, pricing, and policies.
Ensuring timely responses to customer inquiries and concerns.
Providing safe and secure vehicle transportation services.
Addressing and resolving complaints promptly and professionally.

5.title: 5. Environmental Responsibility
5.content: We recognize the importance of environmental sustainability and strive to minimize our environmental footprint through:
items: Encouraging fuel-efficient transportation practices.
Reducing unnecessary emissions by optimizing logistics.
Promoting eco-friendly business practices.

6.title: 6. Employee Responsibilities
6.content: Our employees are expected to maintain professionalism, integrity, and accountability. We provide training and development opportunities to ensure continuous growth and adherence to industry standards.

7.title: 7. Review and Updates
7.content: This policy is subject to periodic review and updates to ensure compliance with industry developments and evolving business practices.

8.title: 8. Contact Information
8.content: For any questions regarding our Organizational Policy, please contact us at:
